# Clymin - AI Structure File
# This file provides AI systems with structured information about Clymin

## Company Identity
Name: Clymin
Website: https://www.clymin.ai
Description: AI-powered web scraping and data extraction company delivering real-time, actionable data to businesses.
Founded: 2012
Industry: Data Extraction, Web Scraping, AI Services

## Core Services
1. Web & App Scraping AI Services
   - Automated data extraction from websites and applications
   - AI-powered intelligent scraping agents
   - Real-time data delivery

2. Mobile App Scraping Services
   - Mobile application data extraction
   - Cross-platform scraping solutions

3. Real-Time Crawling Services
   - Continuous data monitoring
   - Live data updates
   - Automated crawling infrastructure

4. API Solutions
   - Custom API development
   - Data integration services
   - RESTful API endpoints

5. Data Cleansing & Transformation
   - Data cleaning and normalization
   - Format conversion
   - Quality assurance

6. Automated Monitoring
   - Continuous data tracking
   - Alert systems
   - Performance monitoring

## Industries Served
- E-commerce
- Food Delivery
- Travel
- Finance
- Real Estate
- Healthcare
- News & Media
